developer: DSM Grup Danismanlik Iletisim ve Satis Tic. A.S.
description:
Welcome to your ultimate shopping destination where everything you need, from fashion and beauty to home essentials and more, comes together in one place. Enjoy amazing deals, top brands, the latest trends, and so much more!

WELCOME DISCOUNT

First impressions matter, right? That’s why we’ve got an exclusive discount code waiting for you on your first order. Just download Trendyol and claim your welcome treat."

MORE ABOUT THE APP

Trendyol is your go-to shopping platform, making shopping easy and seamless. As you swipe through thousands of global, local and Turkish brands and millions of products, you’ll find a new trend waiting at every scroll. Planning outfits? Tracking orders? Enjoying free returns? It’s all a breeze. Here’s a tip: mark your faves and we’ll let you know when the prices drop. Download the Trendyol app today and start exploring!"

MORE ABOUT TRENDYOL

With our wide selection of clothing, footwear, accessories, home essentials, beauty must-haves, electronics, and more, Trendyol transforms shopping into an experience that’s accessible and budget-friendly. Trendyol Collection translates the latest runway trends into wearable outfits for every style, occasion and budget. Our lines range from a glamorous party selection (Trendyol Party) and a casual jeans collection (Trendyol Denim) to modest fashion looks (Trendyol Modest) and a plus-size collection (Trendyol Curve)."

Now it’s your turn to embrace your unique style from casual and relaxed to elegant and stylish with on-trend fashion pieces for women, men, and kids from Trendyol Collection. Beyond our exclusive brand Trendyol Collection, we also feature some of your most-loved brands such as: Nike, New Balance, Birkenstock, Crocs, Ray-Ban, Skechers, Adidas, Apple, Korkmaz, Samsung, Philips, Almufarrej, Karaca, Home Box, Dyson, Stanley, Lego, Madame Coco, Xiaomi, NA-KD, Converse, Jack & Jones, Dr. Martens, Calvin Klein and more.

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Trendyol app. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

Personal data
Cookies may be installed on your device to improve the operation of the application and enable the processing of your personal data. The administrator of personal data collected via the application or obtained based on your activity in the application is MODIVO.COM S.A based in Zielona Góra. We may process your data in particular for the purpose of performing the contract, for contact and marketing purposes, including profiling. You have the right to transfer, access, rectify and limit processing, and withdraw consent to processing. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the President of the Personal Data Protection Office. More information about the processing of your data by us can be found in the Privacy Policy.

Notino: The whole beauty world in your pocket, anywhere, anytime!

Notino is the largest European online store selling cosmetics and perfumes. We have almost everything in stock from more than 1,500 global brands. Plus offers tailored to suit your tastes, authentic reviews and lots of smart tools to help you choose the right foundation, lipstick or perfume.

Fall in love with Notino today

⁕  App-only offers
Direct access to the best prices, special offers created just for you and available only in the app. Be the first to know about all of our discounts and offers!

⁕ Wishlist
Keep all your beauty favourites in one place, create a shopping list or use Wishlist to hunt for a better deal!

⁕ Reviews
Are you afraid to purchase new beauty products without any personal experience? We've got loads of verified reviews from our customers at Notino to help you with your decision.

⁕ Virtual Try On
Try our Virtual Try On, which shows you how a given shade of lipstick, foundation or eyeshadow will look on you thanks to the selfie mode on your camera. It’s fun ;-)

⁕ Fast, simple and safe shopping
Search, choose, then pay and look forward to receiving your package, which is usually sent the same day!

And that’s not all… Notino will be your endless source of inspiration thanks to our professional blog or our regular live streams ;-)

See you in the Notino app!

Открий DOUGLAS APP – твоето мобилно приложение за оригинална козметика, парфюми и грим.

DOUGLAS е утвърден онлайн и физически козметичен магазин с над 18 години история в България. С нашето приложение получаваш достъп до маркова козметика, нишови парфюми, подаръчни ваучери, и още много – директно на телефона си!

 С приложението DOUGLAS можеш да:
•	Пазаруваш луксозна козметика, грижа за лице, грижа за тяло и коса, както и най-новите грим продукти от известни брандове като DIOR, Tom Ford и LANCÔME
•	Следиш и използваш актуални промоции и отстъпки
•	Получаваш ексклузивни промоции само в приложението
•	Откриваш оригинални парфюми онлайн – за жени и мъже
•	Разглеждаш ексклузивни марки, достъпни само в DOUGLAS
•	Получаваш безплатна доставка при поръчки над 100 лв. 
•	Използваш безплатно връщане за лоялни клиенти с DOUGLAS Beauty Card

Допълнителни предимства:
•	2 безплатни мостри при всяка поръчка над 100 лв.
•	Луксозно опаковане на подаръци

Още възможности:
•	Проверка на наличности в реално време във физическите магазини
•	Предварителна резервация на продукти
•	Видео съдържание и ревюта за топ продукти

DOUGLAS е много повече от просто онлайн магазин за парфюми – той е твоята персонална козметична дестинация, съчетаваща стил, красота и удобство. Наслади се на лесно и сигурно пазаруване – когато и където пожелаеш.

Изтегли приложението DOUGLAS и започни своето приключение в света на красотата още сега!

developer: LC Waikiki Magazacilik Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S.
description:
Everyone Deserves to Dress Well!  

Welcome to the Official LC Waikiki Shopping App!  

We're here to help you dress according to your style and budget, ensuring you feel great. Our mission, 'Everyone Deserves to Dress Well,' invites you to the most stylish destination in fashion.  

If you want to stay up-to-date with fashion and trends, enjoy easy shopping anytime, anywhere! Download the LC Waikiki app to quickly and easily access all information about our leading brand in the clothing industry.  

The easiest way to stay trendy and shop smart is right here! Download our app now and express your style.  

With our LC Waikiki shopping app:  

- Access the trendiest products in women's, men's, kids’ and baby fashion; explore our wide range of home textiles, accessories, and gifts.  
- Activate notifications and stay updated on campaigns, exclusive discounts and surprises for the app, newly added products and fashion trends.  
- Use your favourite list to save all the products you like.  
- Shop quickly and securely with various payment options.  
- Track your orders and returns in each part of the process easily and quickly.

Discover the free Sinsay app - your favorite place to shop online!

Discover the latest trends and fashion inspirations without leaving your home.

Fashion for everyone! We offer a wide selection of clothes and accessories - women's, men's, children's and baby's fashion. You will find everything you need here - from elegant dresses, through comfortable jeans, T-shirts, to stylish accessories and footwear. Also check out our range of cosmetics that perfectly fit into current trends.

A home full of style! At Sinsay you can buy home decorations and other accessories that will change any interior. Create your dream space and don't overpay.

Inspirations and trends! Keep up to date with the latest trends and draw inspiration from our styles. Perfect fashion for everyone is right here!

Attractive promotions! Check the app every day and take advantage of special discount campaigns! Scratch cards, Product of the Day, challenges and many promotions that will make you pay less.

Sinsay Club loyalty program! Join and enjoy unique benefits! For every purchase you collect points that you can exchange for coupons worth up to -XX EUR. Become our regular customer and take advantage of attractive offers only for Club members.
 	
Sinsay Club loyalty program! Join and enjoy unique benefits! For every purchase you collect points that you can exchange for coupons worth up to -XX EUR. Become our regular customer and take advantage of attractive offers only for Club members.

Easy, fast and... attractively priced! The intuitive application will allow you to go through the shopping process in a few simple steps, and attractive prices and a wide selection of clothes give you the opportunity to buy many styles for every occasion.

Functionality! Track the status of your order, add products to Favorites, use returns without a receipt, receive notifications about new products and attractive promotions. All this in one place!

Download the Sinsay application today and join the world of fashion, inspiration and unique opportunities!

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

ANSWEAR

Enter the world of premium fashion at your fingertips. 
With the Answear app, shopping becomes an exciting experience – inspiring, fast and convenient. New arrivals every day, exclusive promotions and access to your favorite brands in one app – for her, for him, for kids – from streetwear to luxury collections.

STAY UP TO DATE

Receive notifications about new arrivals, promotions and limited collections before they hit the shops.

FASHION THAT INSPIRES

Discover ready-made outfits and mix them in just a few clicks. See products not only in perfect photos, but also in motion, thanks to video previews. Use the BUY THE LOOK feature with just one click. Browse products from selected premium brands: jackets, coats, shoes, dresses, trousers, blouses, handbags, backpacks, wallets, as well as designer products from the HOME section - for your home and as gifts. At Answear, we dispatch your order from our warehouse and deliver it in one parcel.

FAST, CONVENIENT, PREMIUM

Add to your basket and buy in seconds. Take advantage of app-only discounts, convenient delivery and easy returns. Save your favorite products and create your own inspirational collections.

ANSWEAR CLUB

Join the loyalty program and get real savings with every purchase by unlocking new discount levels.

YOU CAN ALWAYS CHANGE YOUR MIND

Returns are easy. Did the color, size or style turn out to be wrong? You can return purchased products within 30 days. Requesting a return in the app takes literally seconds!

THE HOTTEST PREMIUM BRANDS

Shop products from over 500 selected global brands, including:
UGG • Tommy Hilfiger • Calvin Klein • Guess • Karl Lagerfeld • Polo Ralph Lauren • Hugo • Boss • Gant • adidas Originals • Reebok • Puma • New Balance • Levi’s • Lacoste • AllSaints • Pinko • The North Face and many more.

PREMIUM FASHION – WHEREVER, WHENEVER, ALWAYS

For women, for men, for children and for home design - all products in one place. With Answear, premium fashion is always at your fingertips - whenever you want it and wherever you are.

https://www.facebook.com/answearcom/
https://www.instagram.com/answear/
https://www.tiktok.com/@answear
https://answear.com/blog/

developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
description:
LIDL PLUS: Find Food Deals, Grocery Coupons and Shopping Rewards on the Products You Love! The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Incredible grocery discounts every time you shop with Lidl! ‘Straight in my basket!’ 

Download, register and save even more. Lidl Plus is our new rewards app, designed to give you discounts on the products you love. 

The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Available in Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland, Great Britain and Malta. 

We’ll send you Lidl coupons based on the products that you love. Simply activate your coupons and scan in store to make incredible savings on your Lidl shopping. 

Every time you shop, you will also get the chance to win amazing prizes*. So what’s not to like? Check out the best things about the Lidl Plus loyalty app and how to use it.

HOW TO GET LIDL PLUS LOYALTY REWARDS:

 - Activate your coupons in the app and scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till to redeem and save money on your shop.
 - Scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till for the chance to win great prizes* on each store visit!
 -  Never lose a receipt again. You’ll get a purchase summary and a digital copy of your receipt with Lidl Plus.
 -  Never miss another offer. Browse through a digital version of our weekly leaflet in the app.

Plus many more exciting features!

We made this app to reward you for shopping at Lidl and to help you find deals on your favourite foods, drinks and household items. 

From amazing food coupons to saving money on your next shop – Lidl Plus is the app to download if you want to get the best food deals and shopping discounts. We’re always looking to help you enjoy quality products at great prices, so download our free loyalty app and register today and find food deals, shopping rewards and grocery coupons on the products you love.

*This feature is not available in all countries.

When joining the Lidl Plus program, you can allow tracking technology, which helps us to understand how you interact with the app. This includes what pages you visit, what coupons you view, and how long you spend on each page. This tracking allows Lidl Plus to improve the app and provide you with tailored communication, discounts and to participate in relevant surveys.

The My dm app has many attractive advantages and features!

Shopping with your smart handheld device? The My dm app has many attractive advantages, useful features and exciting services, and allows you to conveniently shop for your favourite products.

Log in using your existing My dm account. The app will then be tailored to your personal needs.

Download the app and get started
1. Download the My dm app to your smartphone
2. Log in with your My dm account credentials or register for a new customer account.

The best functions at a glance

Get an overview of the product range
Our search function, all the product categories and our scan function give you a quick and easy overview of the product range. Simply click through our assortment, search for specific brands or scan products, view products you’ve purchased previously, add them to your watch list, share your watch list with friends or shop directly.

Find your local store
You can search for stores near you with direct access to the store finder. This gives you quick and easy access to service information. You can save your preferred store in the app and thus display the available stock on the product pages in addition to the online availability.

Your opinion is what matters
We want to constantly improve our app. That’s why we welcome your feedback. Simply use our feedback section to let us know what you think. Please note that you will not receive confirmation when you send feedback. If you have any further questions or problems with the app, please refer to ‘Help & FAQs’ or use our contact form.

developer: Grupa OLX Sp. z o. o.
description:
OLX помага на всеки да направи добрия избор: 

* Добрият избор за теб. Намери новия си дом или кой да ремонтира нещо в него.
* Добрият избор за твоя бюджет. Открий редки находки на изгодни цени или започни собствен бизнес.
* Добрият избор за света. Купувай от частни лица и продавай своите запазени вещи, които вече не използваш. 

С мобилното приложение на OLX можеш лесно да намериш, купиш или продадеш почти всичко онлайн: 

* Нови и запазени вещи втора употреба: дрехи, електроника, мебели
* Къщи и апартаменти за продажба или под наем
* Коли, мотори, части и аксесоари - както нови, така и втора ръка
* Разнообразие от услуги, събития и почивки
* Работа
* И още много!

Открий всичко това навсякъде и по всяко време с приложението на OLX!
Изтегли го сега, за да можеш:

* Да търсиш сред милиони обяви от различни категории в цялата страна


* Да запазваш обяви и запаметяваш търсения, като следиш любимите си обяви и получаваш известия за нови или когато цената на някоя от наблюдаваните се промени

* Да публикуваш бързо своите обяви: снимай директно през приложението или добави снимка от галерията на телефона си, напиши заглавие и описание и избери подходящата категория 

* Да споделяш обяви: сподели любимите си обяви с приятели чрез любимите си приложения като Viber или Facebook Messenger

* Да управляваш обявите си: редактирай или архивирай своите обяви, или ги промотирай, за да достигнат по-широка аудитория

* Да си пишеш с купувачи и продавачи: помоли за повече информация, изпрати повече снимки или сподели местоположението си директно в приложението и сключи сделката в реално време

* Използвай “Сигурна доставка”: изпращай и получавай артикули със сигурна доставка от OLX

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Discover the smartest way to shop!

Install the Kaufland app and you’ll always have your Kaufland Card in your pocket. Our clever shopping assistant can point you to the latest special offers, exclusive coupons and innovative ways to shop and pay, making your shopping experience as easy and efficient as it can be.

Here are all the benefits of the Kaufland app:

•	Giant selection of products from the Kaufland.de online marketplace
•	Access to exclusive coupons, partner benefits and prize draws
•	K-SCAN: Make your shop even quicker: Scan your own products
•	Kaufland Pay: Safe and simple! Just scan to pay!
•	Request digital receipts
•	Find nearby store locations
•	Browse through the current leaflets and offers
•	Make digital shopping lists
•	Discover mouthwatering recipes

Receive exclusive coupons for shopping in-store and on the online marketplace

Use your Kaufland app to regularly find exclusive new coupons which you can redeem on purchases in-store or on our online marketplace. The Kaufland.de online marketplace is integrated with the app. With more than 45 million products in 6,400 categories for you to browse, it’s a true shopping paradise. Just activate your chosen coupons in the app, then save big the next time you shop!

Reap the rewards of partner benefits and more with the Kaufland Card

The Kaufland Card gives you access to extra discounts not only on selected Kaufland items, but also on offers from Kaufland partners like Europcar or home24.  You can also take part in exciting prize draws every month, and you will receive loyalty points for every shop. Just scan at the checkout, collect points and redeem them for bonuses or exclusive coupons.

K-SCAN: Scan your shop yourself

Shop and pay faster: In selected stores, you can scan your items yourself before placing them in your cart. Then pay for your shop at the self-service checkout. No need to put your items on the belt!

Kaufland Pay: Scan to pay for your Kaufland shop

Forgot your wallet? No problem! Kaufland Pay is a payment system that lets you pay quickly, easily and safely with every shop. Just open the Kaufland app at the checkout, hold the Kaufland Pay QR code under the card reader, and you’re done! 

Keep an eye on your spending with digital receipts

Bye-bye, receipt overflow: Every time you scan your Kaufland Card at the checkout, your digital receipt will be saved in your Kaufland app, available for you to view on your smartphone at any time. Keep a close eye on your spending even when a receipt goes missing!

Find your nearest Kaufland store

With the navigation, you can find your nearest supermarket in seconds. Looking for a location with a fish counter or free e-car charging? The handy filter function will show you exactly which Kaufland store you need.

Browse current leaflets and use our offers

Browse through the most recent leaflets, be inspired and find the best in-store offers for your favorite products. Filter by category and add items to your shopping list with just one tap.

Create your digital shopping list

Put everything you need from our categories or offers straight onto your shopping list and share it with family or friends.

Do you want to find out more or give us feedback? We love hearing from you – with your help, we can make your shopping experience even better. Just write to us at: Kundenmanagement@kaufland.de
 
Find more from Kaufland at: www.kaufland.de
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kaufland/?ref=ts&fref=ts
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/kauflandde
 
General terms & conditions: https://filiale.kaufland.de/nutzungsbedingungen-app.html

Store mode

Пазарувай в BILLA по-лесно благодарение на новото приложение. В допълнение на полезните функции като локатор на най-близкия магазин до теб и навигация до избран магазин, приложението съдържа и най-актуалната седмична брошура. Сега можеш да се регистрираш чрез приложението в програмата за лоялност BILLA Card и да получиш дигитална карта. Към нея ще намериш и страхотни ваучери за отстъпка на избрани продукти, както и талони за отстъпка при наши партньори.



Функции на приложението BILLA App:



Онлайн регистрация в програмата BILLA Card

Дигитална BILLA Card

Талони за отстъпка при наши ексклузивни партньори

Възможност за поръчка на физическа карта BILLA Card

Откриване на най-близък магазин

Предложение за маршрут до избран магазин

Актуална седмична брошура

Продуктови ваучери за отстъпка
